data.name: Light of Foliar Incision
data.passiveDescription: CRIT Rate is increased by {{4//5//6//7//8%}}. After Normal Attacks deal Elemental DMG, the Foliar Incision effect will be obtained, increasing DMG dealt by Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills by {{120//150//180//210//240%}} of Elemental Mastery. This effect will disappear after 28 DMG instances or 12s. You can obtain Foliar Incision once every 12s.
